name: Corona-The Game (KocianTech)
description:
Story driven RPG, post-apo Gameboy game.

I am using this as public test and proof of concept.

Demo can have bugs, please report them here.

Game is going to be released on real cartridge, compatibile with all Nintendo Gameboy generations and devices capable to read Gameboy cartridges

Facebook developer blog here

v0_0_1 

First public test!

What you can find in the test:

1.  Complete menu system

  • Tool and resources management
  • Working health system (HP)
  • Game save option
  • Not working map

2. Grow your own food!

  • Mechanism for growing your own food
  • Pick up tools and resources you need for growing
  • Shovel 
  • Seeds
  • Bagpack
  • Watch resources in menu system
